name: Holiday Favorites Collection
description:
Can't choose just one? Looking for a gift? We have put together this collection of our holiday favorite soaps including Sleigh Ride, Mistletoe, Candy Cane and Hot Cocoa. Please see individual listings for fragrance descriptions and ingredient lists for each soap. Each is wrapped individually.

Four x Net Wt 4 oz / 113 g

name: Pumpkin Spice Handcrafted Soap
description:
This handcrafted goat milk soap has the aroma of freshly baked pumpkin pie! I've added colloidal oatmeal into the soap for an extra special treat for your skin! This soap is a two layer with an earthy pumpkin color on top and a warm brown on the bottom.

Net Wt 4 oz / 113 g 

<hr>

Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Safflower Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Goat's Milk, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), Titanium Dioxide, Oat Flour, Fragrance, Mica, Iron Oxides

name: Butt Naked Bath Salts
description:
Butt Naked is a super popular fruity blend of granny smith apples, honeydew melon, strawberries and pears with just a hint of spice. 

Made with Dead Sea Salts, Mediterranean Sea Salts, and Epsom Salts, this unique blend of bath salts will transform your bath into a luxurious spa experience.

To Use: Dissolve 2-3 scoops into a hot bath to relax and rejuvenate. 

You will receive one (1) 16 oz / 454 g jar bath salts with a scoop, enough for approximately 8-10 baths.  

<hr>

Ingredients: Sea Salt, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Ultramarines, Tin Oxide

name: Buttercream Lip Balm
description:

Beeswax, coconut oil, Shea butter, avocado oil, and rice bran oil are used to create a smooth, buttery balm that will leave your lips soft, conditioned and moisturized. Net Wt .15 / 4 g Looking for a gift or special treat for yourself? Have a look at our Lip Balm Trio.

name: Black Raspberry Vanilla Body Butter Bar
description:
A blend of blackberries, raspberries, and vanilla.

Net Wt 1 oz / 28 g

<hr>

The body butter bar is essentially a solid body butter. Don't let the size fool you! This little guy may be small, but it is loaded with skin-loving oils and butters to help combat parched skin. With a different feel than water-based lotions you are accustomed to, these are super concentrated so a little goes a long way! 

To Use: Simply rub the bar in your hands to release the oils and butters with the natural temperature of your body and apply where needed. While you may find the product oily when first applied, within a few minutes it will absorb beautifully leaving your skin soft and supple.

<hr>

Ingredients: Beeswax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Avocado Oil (Persea Gratissima), Rice Bran Oil (Oryza Sativa), Fragrance

description:
Hippie Chickie has notes of sweet orange, lavender, woody patchouli and incense.

Net Wt 1 oz / 28 g

<hr>

The body butter bar is essentially a solid body butter. Don't let the size fool you! This little guy may be small, but it is loaded with skin-loving oils and butters to help combat parched skin. With a different feel than water-based lotions you are accustomed to, these are super concentrated so a little goes a long way! 

To Use: Simply rub the bar in your hands to release the oils and butters with the natural temperature of your body and apply where needed. While you may find the product oily when first applied, within a few minutes it will absorb beautifully leaving your skin soft and supple.

<hr>

Ingredients: Beeswax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Avocado Oil (Persea Gratissima), Rice Bran Oil (Oryza Sativa), Fragrance
